metadata.title: CVE-2018-3838 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An exploitable information vulnerability exists in the XCF image renderingfunctionality of Simple DirectMedia Layer SDL2_image-2.0.2. A speciallycrafted XCF image can cause an out-of-bounds read on the heap, resulting ininformation disclosure. An attacker can display a specially crafted imageto trigger this vulnerability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-3838` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsdl2-image-2.0-0 - 2.0.3+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

libsdl-image1.2 - 1.2.12-8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsdl2-image package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.3+dfsg1-1').
sdl-image1.2 package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.12-8').
